dc_description_s: This point shapefile provides the location, current and previous owners, power type and other infomation for power plants in the United States. Data are updated to 2015. This layer is a part of a collection of GIS data containing renewable and electric energy information for the U.S., including data on transmission lines, power plants and electricity substations.This layer can be used to locate power plants within the United States.
